wikipedia_page.main: Ashley Campbell is a British actor, dancer and singer of English and Grenadian heritage. Campbell is known for his portrayal of Ollie in the CBBC children's drama The Mysti Show.

response: The characters within the narrative segments included Mysti (Laura Aikman) who is half-human and half-fairy, and her friends Rick (Oliver Mason), Ella (Eva Alexander), Ollie (Ashley Campbell) and Abby (Yasmin Paige). Other characters also appeared frequently, such as Professor Dust (David Sterne) and Tatiana (Tricia George), fairies Snowdrop (Amy Pemberton) and Peaceblossom (Danielle Tabor), and diner owner Mr. K (Richard James).
* Ashley Campbell (actor) (born 1979), British stage and television actor
* Ashley Campbell (musician), singer-songwriter and daughter of Glen Campbell
* George Ashley Campbell (1870–1954), American electrical engineer
| The mother of Andrew (Ashley Campbell) who refuses to part with her favourite chair.
